text: @BryanCranston Trump's not perfect. No one is. But he's fighting. He's trying and he has a bunch of trolls trying to bring him down. Everyone want coronavirus to end and he is going to turn over ever rock to make that happen. An imperfect man among imperfect men. Respect!
